title: What to Read This Week
sub_head: Our celebration of seasonal books on topics like nature, gardening, food and baseball—plus David Hockney in France, Richard Thompson’s musical memoir, ‘The Agitators’ and more.
body:
How Harriet Tubman, Martha Wright and Frances Seward challenged a nation’s conscience. Review by Melanie Kirkpatrick.
Read the review

New books that help us see how gardens help us “forget the troubles of our world.” Review by Barbara Paul Robinson.
